reuters.title: SYNERGEN <SYGN> FILES TO OFFER SHARES
reuters.body: Synergen Inc said it has filed for an offering of 1,500,000 common shares through underwriters led by Alex. Brown Inc <ABSB>, Hambrecht and Quist Inc and Boettcher and Co Inc. It said proceeds will be used to fund research and testing and for other general corporate purposes. Reuter 
